𒆂 KA×ŠID "side" 𒌋 giguru "edge"
𒆂 𒅗𒋃 𒅗𒁺 KA.DU "Kante"

4 cardinal directions, steerings

sides sidere sīdus “star; constellation” directions dīrectus dīrigō “lay straight; direct; distribute”

  1. 𓇼 •vostra : east first αριστερό aristeró erst proto larboard “port” (left)
  2. 𓇼 australis : south zweit 𓋴 𓏃 𓈖 𓏏 𓊛 sunder sudan
  3. 𓇼 •vestra : west third droit right crc starboard tribordo dritta!
  4. 𓇼 nostra? : north tetra
  5. 𓇼 “ether” 𐌀𐌉𐌈𐌕𐌓𐌀 𓄿 𓊃 𓂋 𓏏 𓇯 aiθtra† αἰθήρ, αἰθέρος aithḗr aithéros

Four 2+2 sides 𒂡 festivals or aspects of Venus Ishtar 𒀭 𒈹

𒀭𒈹𒉣 NUN noon : visible aspect of Venus at zenith 𓄋 𓏏 𓏤 at noon, morning and evening
𒀭𒈹𒆳 KUR secret invisible aspect of Venus at night
𒀭𒈹𒌓 shining/rising Venus: Morning Star
𒀭𒈹𒋝 setting Venus: Evening Star

𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 𓏤 ⇔ starboard ?

𓉻 𓂝 𓄿 𓄿 | Asiatic | Achaeans , Achaear, airgaier Aegear +++
𓉻 𓂝 𓄿 𓏜 | greatness | ἄριστος áristos, “best” ⇔ aristocracy
